main event: Three witnesses observed an object about half the size of a house with red and blue colors traveling east in Macon, Georgia.
interesting points: The object was confirmed to be a C-124 aircraft,The sighting occurred on 8-May-1966 at 20:35,The observers reported the sky condition as hazy,There were negative radar results in the area,The total duration of the sighting was approximately 2 seconds.
sighted object: an object about half the size of a house with red and blue colors
